content.p: We are a research leader in the $512 billion global medical devices industry. Our work ranges from R&D collaborations with multinational companies and SMEs, through to successful innovations via spin-out companies. And we’re always looking for opportunities to work closely with organisations to drive future health innovation and economic development. Our expertise includes core engineering areas, clinical expertise and need identification. We have close links with local teaching hospitals, translational medicine and health-economic modelling. And our region is home to a diverse and stable multi-ethnic population – enabling scalable clinical trials. Caroline Sykes Business Partnerships Manager caroline.sykes@nottingham.ac.uk
